content:
"The Last Dance" was an incredible documentary series! If you enjoyed that, here are some upcoming and recently released sports documentaries and series on Netflix that you might enjoy:

1. **"Break Point"**: A new tennis documentary series that explores the lives of top tennis players, including Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, and Serena Williams.
2. **"UNTOLD"**: A five-part documentary series that tells the stories of five iconic athletes, including boxer Sugar Ray Robinson, tennis player Martina Navratilova, and more.
3. **"The Redeemed and the Dominant: LeBron vs. Durant"**: A documentary that explores the rivalry between LeBron James and Kevin Durant, featuring exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes footage.
4. **"The Sons of Sam: A Descent into Darkness"**: A true-crime documentary series that delves into the 1970s New York City sports scene and the Son of Sam murders.
5. **"The Playbook"**: A documentary series that profiles top coaches from various sports, including the NBA, NFL, and college football, offering insights into their coaching philosophies and strategies.

These are just a few examples, but Netflix is constantly adding new sports content, so be sure to keep an eye on their sports documentary section for more exciting releases!

Now, get ready to cheer on Manchester City and the Lakers, and enjoy your next sports documentary binge-fest!
